abstract: Crew believes it sunk U-boat in gun fight off Trinidad
snippet: HALIFAX, April 1 (Canadian Press)--The crew of the British tanker El Ciervo expressed belief today their ship had sunk a German U-boat in a gun fight off Trinidad....

headline.main: U-BOAT HELD SUNK BY BRITISH TANKER; Crew of El Ciervo Say Craft Disappeared After Battle Off Trinidad on March 4 16 SHOTS FIRED BY SHIP Submarine Submerged After a Torpedo Missed Its Mark-- All Hands Believed Lost

lead_paragraph: HALIFAX, April 1 (Canadian Press)--The crew of the British tanker El Ciervo expressed belief today their ship had sunk a German U-boat in a gun fight off Trinidad.
